title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - 4B Camino Estación
description: Near the center and the beginning of a greenway, there is also an abandoned mining center that can be visited with caution as it is in very bad condition.

title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - 13 Calle de la Paz
description: Quiet place to park and sleep without problems. There was movement of trucks and buses, but it is a flat parking lot and without too much noise.

title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - Unnamed Road
description: This picnic area is right in front of the paying one. You can maybe spend the night but I would not do it because a lot of barbecues fixed and not very clean, it attracts rats especially at night and therefore they eat you cables or other on your vehicle, seen the same thing in Portugal but here I did not see a hole because maybe the locals poison them. Otherwise there is a trash and nearby homes, fishermen also come, a semblance of beach in the small bay facing the other area. Above all do not take the dirt road on the right before you arrive because clogged despite the Google Map guidance, continue on the asphalt road to the gate and there was a sign but you can not read anything.

name: Casa rural Nuevo Pantano
title: (14200) Casa rural Nuevo Pantano
description: It is a private parking where there are rural houses, a quiet place in the middle of nature and next to the Sierra Boyera reservoir. Water, electricity and wifi installations.

title: (14240) Belmez - 1 Calle Castillo
description: Parking near the castle. Visit the city and the region. Quiet but with a little car noise.

title: (14240) Córdoba - 1B Prolongacion Pedroche
description: Parking next to the municipal swimming pool, at the foot of the greenway for mountain biking routes, and magnificent for visiting the town's castle, a very quiet place to rest

title: (14209) Doña Rama - 38 Calle Sevilla
description: Picnic zone

title: (14290) Fuente Obejuna - 82 Poligono el Blanquillo
description: Quiet place in the industrial area of the airport. Next to a funeral home… so best to spend the night only. Some benches to sit on . Better location than the hotel: No dust and more privacy. There is also a security guard for the industrial park. No problem staying overnight here.

title: (14290) - 1I Poligono el Blanquillo
description: Hotel Rural Torres Romero. Place to park one km from Fuenteovejuna, next to the national highway. There are more trucks and motorhomes in front of the hotel. Quiet, spacious and bright. 500 meters gas station.

title: (14290) Fuente Obejuna - 1 Paseo Fuente Nueva
description: Pretty horizontal place, with fountain and beautiful watering hole, two bars close enough not to disturb, one hundred meters Supermarket Dia. Population with Modernist Mansion, Church and Hermitage of Jesús Nazareno

title: (14230) Villanueva del Rey -
description: Large picnic area and plenty of space in a beautiful spot. There are also swings for children. Nice place to stop and maybe spend the night (no bans seen).

title: (14230) Villanueva del Rey - ctra CO-5401, JUNTO A PISTA POLIDEPORTIVA
title_short: (14230) Villanueva del Rey - ctra CO-5401, JUNTO A PISTA POLIDEPORTIVA
description: Esplanade near Hotel Rural Las Monteras (cafeteria, restaurant and pool), next to the N-432 (500 m.) 500 m. of the town of Villanueva del Rey.

address.street: ctra CO-5401, JUNTO A PISTA POLIDEPORTIVA

title: (14299) Ojuelos Bajos - 3 Calle Real
description: Low eyes. Picnic area with the possibility of overnight, we spend a very quiet night. There is a road nearby and access to the village (50 inhabitants), but little traveled. Several picnic tables and nearby fountain. Some shade and some leveled plots. In the morning the baker passed. There is only one bar and there are no shops

title: (14230) Villanueva del Rey -
description: Parking at the Costa d'una Betzinera and at the restaurant of the Hotel La Laguna, 100 m from the N-432. La lloc is quiet, peaceful, perfect for a stopover, a dream that only gets better in the end. Hello, there is a company on the coast but not Escoltem Cap Soroll. Approximately 1 km from Villanueva del Rey, 60 km from the motorhome area of Córdoba. If you use it, please respect the environment...

title: (14298) Piconcillo - 28 Calle Cervantes
description: Piconcillo. Picnic area where you can spend the night in complete tranquility. At night absolutely no noise is heard, perfect for resting. Village famous for the closeness of the stars, the nights are spectacular. In the picnic area there are several tables with individual barbecues. In the village there is only one bar and no shops, but in the mornings the baker comes selling bread, and the gardener selling products from the gardens. The location to spend the night is next to the soccer field, in front of the shacks and barbecues.

title: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - A-422
description: Recreation area "Virgen de Guía". Pines and oaks with children's park, football field, tables with benches, containers and water. Clean and quiet place to rest next to a small hermitage. Chemin de Saint-Jacques Silver Route in front.

title: (14220) Espiel - CO-4400
description: Esplanade of land in which the buses that come to the Espiel lodge park (in the old train station). It has no services, but the place is perfect to spend a night and then be able to participate in the active leisure activities of the hostel, or simply take a walk on the trails in the area. Electricity available.

title: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - 2 Avenida Marqués de Santillana
title_short: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - 2 Avenida Marqués de Santillana
description: automatic laundry

title: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - A-422
description: Near the center and at the door of one of the sausages trade...

title: (14250) Villanueva del Duque - 4 Calle Paseo Aurelio Teno
title_short: (14250) Villanueva del Duque - 4 Calle Paseo Aurelio Teno
description: Villanueva del Duque

title: (14220) Espiel -
description: Esplanade next to the hermitage. Sometimes you can find families eating, although it is not the most common. The parking lot is flat and accessible to any vehicle since the road is in excellent condition. We spent a very good night and the sky (without moon) is spectacular

title: (14480) Alcaracejos -
description: Place El Santo in Alcaracejos. Somewhat far from the town, but it has water loading, emptying and a picnic area. Little shade. Ideal for hiking and the Camino Mozarabe.

title: (14480) Alcaracejos - Camino de Alcaracejos Alarroyo de Cerrovero
title_short: (14480) Alcaracejos - Camino de Alcaracejos Alarroyo de Cerrovero
description: Parking between the swimming pool and the watchtower, possible overnight stay, no service except the garbage cans.

address.street: Camino de Alcaracejos Alarroyo de Cerrovero

title: (14480) Alcaracejos - 1 Plaza de Andalucía
description: Parking in the city center

title: (14480) Alcaracejos - 31 Calle Pozoblanco
description: Large parking lot with clean and well maintained surface.

title: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic zone. The entrance is a sandy track that is very good, parking area, picnic tables, this place is ideal to be in the middle of nature next to the Zujar river, where you can observe different types of birds, plants and insects depending on the season of the year

title: (06910) Granja de Torrehermosa - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area of the "El Poleo" pond. It has many picnic tables and shady trees. All in front of a pond. Easy access. We arrived late and had a very quiet night. Let's try to keep it clean! Thanks!

title: (14470) El Viso -
description: A pretty corner with a barbecue, picnic table and a dumpster to throw away your garbage cans, very clean place, flowery, at the edge of the water with, in case, a large courtyard for the rain. easy to reach by motorhome despite the dirt road. possible to park several vehicles.

title: () El Viso - A-3281
description: Quiet spot next to the marsh to eat and take a quiet nap.

title: (14220) Espiel - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dam. More or less space depending on the water level.

title: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - 16 Calle Diego de Córdoba
title_short: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - 16 Calle Diego de Córdoba
description: Shaded parking area. Near the municipal swimming pool with very good facilities that in summer is mandatory. There is also a bar, near there is a grove with lots of shade, swings for children, paddle tennis court, gym and sports center.

title: (14300) Villaviciosa de Córdoba - Unnamed Road
description: Picknick place with lots of shade, tables and bins. We cleaned the garbage. We stayed overnight and were not bothered. Some people came in the night to play loud music (Saturday). Be sure to park in the front lot if you stay the night, they closed the red/white barrier and this was not reopened when we left on Sunday afternoon. Beautiful night sky!

title: (14280) Belalcázar - 37 Calle Daoiz y Velarde
description: Asphalted, horizontal, next to the Roman bridge and fairground, downtown. Things to see: Sotomayor y Zúñiga Castle, beautiful 4-spout and hexagonal fountain with a water trough next to a public laundry room and viewpoint, Old Post, Plaza Ayto., El Pilar, Church, Convent, Hermitages.

title: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - 65 Carretera Zalamea
description: Ample area to park as there is a shaded walkway. Right in front there is a bakery and a little further a hostel with a bar-restaurant.

title: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - 15 Calle Paloma
description: Area with ample parking as there is a promenade where you can park, there is shade and it is very quiet.

title: (06919) Peraleda del Zaucejo - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with shade, tables, barbecues, swings for children, water fountain, and a small lagoon where you can practice fishing and enjoy some species of birds.

title: (14300) Villaviciosa de Córdoba - 71 Carretera Posadas
description: Recreational area on the outskirts of town, there are no indications against the motorhome, we have only visited it in passing, if someone stays overnight to say so in the comments, it is a good place in the middle of nature for a stop on the way or spend a weekend in nature.

title: (14470) El Viso -
description: Free area at the foot of the lava reservoir, very quiet area

title: (14470) El Viso - Playa fluvial de la Colada
title_short: (14470) El Viso - Playa fluvial de la Colada
description: Fluvial beach of the Colada reservoir, located in the Guadiana river basin and captures the waters of the Guadamatilla river. Beautiful sunsets on the beach or the terrace of the bar.

title: (14470) El Viso - 30 Poligono Industrial
description: Free point for loading / unloading water. We recommend visiting La Colada beach with unique sunsets. Nearby there is a playground and the municipal swimming pool.

title: (14300) Córdoba -
description: Perfect place in the middle of nature to spend a night and rest. Good access with a neighborhood road with very little traffic.

title: (06920) Azuaga - 3 Calle Matachel
description:
Parking in large open space, next to the local police and a playground. A good place, quiet, and surrounded by houses, near a children's school. It is very broad and safe. Near the park, next to the road, there are two stands with light sockets available for caravans. Azuaga is a beautiful place.

In the town (Berlanga) before arriving they have a filling and emptying station near the road.

title: () Espiel - CO-6410
description: Nice picnic area. Two entrances the upper is parking space for cars. The lower has entrance for camper. Slightly slanted. Furthermore, tables with pergolas with reeds. Waste bins.

title: (06920) Azuaga - 120 Calle Carrera
description:
Municipal motorhome area, next to the bullring, is unfinished, but you can unload gray water and the potti, someday they will add water and electricity because everything is ready but they don't finish it. It is a quiet place next to the town. It's the fairgrounds, so in
the August fair (days 14,
15, 16, 17, 18) you cannot park. The town is pretty and has a lot to see and the people are very nice.

title: (14460) Dos Torres - 1D Calle San Blas
description: Online parking, asphalt, very quiet, inhabited area, very close (opposite Plaza Toros) Bar-Churreria "Brillante" exquisite churros and chocolate, 5 minutes from Plaza Ayto., Excellent price-quality food at Bar J. Michelin. Things to see: Tourist Office located in a Casona, free visit, essential visit. Plaza de la Villa, Supports former prison of Torremolinos, Town Hall, Churches, Hermitages, Snow Pit, San Juan Bridge, Santa Ana Bridge with a two-spout fountain and trough, Shields and Lintels of different houses.

title: (14460) Dos Torres - 1D Calle San Isidro
description: Dirt parking that can fit several motorhomes without problem, it is located on the town's soccer field, next to the municipal swimming pool that has a bar where they offer a little of everything. Impossible to access it the third week of August because the town festivals are celebrated. Quiet area the rest of the year. With shops 5 minutes away, without availability of water filling and emptying of gray water and toilets.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 51 Calle Encina
description: Easily accessible launderette with ample parking space nearby. Open until 22:00.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 1 Calle Blas Infante
description: Wide parking spaces on both sides of Blas Infante Street, long and flat. Very quiet street at night (we stayed for two nights), a little traffic in the morning. No discomfort for the neighborhood because two walls run along the street. Waste bins sorting nearby. 10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (14280) Belalcázar - A-422
description: Rest area on the road, with the possibility of spending the night to rest, it is next to the road.

title: (14210) Villaharta -
description: Large parking with restaurant for car and truck. Quiet and clean.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 26 Calle Felipe II
description: Hospital and health center parking. height limitation as there are parasols.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 14 Avenida de Carlos Cano
description: Roadside in front of fields

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 93 Carretera Diseminado Circunvalación
description: Newly built area (February-2021)

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - Unnamed Road
description: Super wooded pitches under the oaks, with a large playground for children and a golf course and its terrace. Very quiet, easy access for small and large motorhomes. One hour from Cordoba.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 172 Calle Pintor Julio Romero
description: Quiet place next to the sports hall. There is an area in the town, but it was occupied by a fair. Next door is a bar with a good breakfast.

title: (14300) -
description: Stop and picknick place with a nice view

title: (14470) El Viso - N-502
description: Picnic area with many tables and large trees. It has a hermitage and a stage. Very quiet but the road is heard though not very busy. A container bin has been installed just in front of the chapel. This is one of the cleanest sites I’ve visited during my travel through Spain.

name: CAMPING LEISURE CITY
title: (14400) CAMPING LEISURE CITY
description: Municipal campsite 2a "Ciudad d'El Ocio". 2 km from Pozoblanco. Bucolic setting in a large complex with golf, horse club, fishing club and hiking trail. Ideal for visiting the Los Pedroches Valley.

title: (06613) Benquerencia de la Serena - Calle Carretera
title_short: (06613) Benquerencia de la Serena - Calle Carretera
description: Rest area.

title: (41460) Las Navas de la Concepción - 27 Calle Jose Maria Peman (Recinto Ferial)
title_short: (41460) Las Navas de la Concepción - 27 Calle Jose Maria Peman (Recinto Ferial)
description: Fairground. Market on Friday mornings on the other side of the fairground.

title: (41380) Alanís - Carril de Las Navas
description: Recreational area between pine forests in very quiet winter about 5 km from the town

title: (06614) Cabeza del Buey - Unnamed Road
description: Sanctuary of Our Lady of Bethlehem Perfect place to take a break, it has picnic boxes, toilets, sinks and restaurant. Possibility of taking water. Site with lots of parking and a lot of shade

title: (06600) Cabeza del Buey - Unnamed Road
description: It is a quiet place to eat and sleep. I don't know if night traffic would stop sleeping on weekends. It is next to a road with little traffic and has shade trees.

title: (41388) San Nicolás del Puerto - 34 SE-163
description: A recreational area along the Hueznar River

title: (41388) San Nicolás del Puerto - 41 Calle Real
title_short: (41388) San Nicolás del Puerto - 41 Calle Real
description: Parking by the river next to the road bridge.

title: (06600) Cabeza del Buey - EX-322
description: Gas station with drinking water, possibility of unloading gray water, camping gas cylinders and gas cartridges, motorhome washing, grocery store and typical products from Extremadura

title: (06439) Esparragosa de la Serena - 35 Paseo Príncipe Felipe
title_short: (06439) Esparragosa de la Serena - 35 Paseo Príncipe Felipe
description: Parking area, flat, next to the pools, there are toilets, next to a lake, good bike routes, to visit its famous wineries for its pitarra wine, church, etc., beach bars in summer, with many tapas and pork portions Iberico, typical of the area, in summer you can access the pools, 100% Siberia Extremadura.

title: (06429) Benquerencia de la Serena - 45 Calle Corredera
title_short: (06429) Benquerencia de la Serena - 45 Calle Corredera
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, but with good views, near a roadside Hotel. Nice visit to the castle with views of La Serena and cave paintings. Recommendable.

title: (41389) San Nicolás del Puerto - 83 Calle Cerro del Hierro B
title_short: (41389) San Nicolás del Puerto - 83 Calle Cerro del Hierro B
description: Ideal place to do the green route of the Cerro del Hierro mines, has a bar, closed today Wednesday, small and cozy town. If it can be night. You have a source of drinking water.

title: (41389) Cerro de Hierro - 84 Calle Cerro del Hierro B
title_short: (41389) Cerro de Hierro - 84 Calle Cerro del Hierro B
description: Large earthen car park south of the village. Small view of the old mine. Garbage can and playground nearby. No prohibition sign and an elderly person from the village told us that it was not forbidden to sleep here.

title: (41389) San Nicolás del Puerto - Unnamed Road
title_short: (41389) San Nicolás del Puerto - Unnamed Road
description: Departure of the trails to visit the cerro de hierro. Parking, tables and benches, toilets and water.

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - Unnamed Road
description: I've got space for a barbecue and to stay overnight. Quietest place we've had in Spanish in 5 weeks. Follow the dirt road past the visitor center on the left. Probably hard to get to with a bus sized camper van, but a regular camper van is no problem (mine is 3.5m high and 6.5m long). Pick Nick tables and fireplace. hiking trails around. Good place. Some navigation systems do not find the location. Here are the coordinates of the junction N 37' 50'52.44" W 005 15'33.52"

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - A-3151
description: Perfect place to spend a night with nature around, special for hiking.

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - CO-5310
title_short: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - CO-5310
description: Superb lake very little frequented in the heart of the natural park. Several locations along the lake road allow parking and swimming below while keeping an eye on your vehicle. No prohibition sign but a priori it is forbidden to sleep there because it is a protected area. Beautiful day of swimming with breathtaking views. Almost no network.

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - 12 Carretera del Cementerio
description: Drinking water source

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - 5 Carretera San Calixto
description: Area for motorhomes and caravans. We talk to the town hall and tourism and there is no problem in parking the caravan and they are not very strict when it comes to unhooking. It is the date we were without opening, it will be on 12/16/2017. The town is great and has many possibilities for hiking, tapas in bars etc. Very friendly people. It has gray drains.

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - 3 CP-002
description: Hornachuelos (Cordoba). Small place. Near the nature reserve.

title: (14740) Hornachuelos - 17D Avenida del Guadalquivir
description: Parking near a pier and next to a hiking trail. Very calm. There are no signs of prohibited overnight stay.
